title: Top Places to visit in Noney, Longmai, Manipur
content: Noney, also known as Longmai, is a town located in western part of Manipur, India. It is 63 kilometres (39 mi) west of Imphal, the capital of the state of Manipur. Its population is almost entirely made up of Rongmei Naga. Previously known as a village, recently has been declared as one of the ne
